description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Zap through moon rock with the Z-50 laser canon and blast through steel floors with the X-3 space drill!  Cross vast distances using alien transporters and bridge gaps with the power of thought!!  Just some of the tools required to guide the Little Green Men (LGM) to safety over Martian landscapes and extra-terrestrial obstacles.  Make life and death decisions sacrificing a few to save the many.
